name: OR_CASE_ANES_STAF
description: The OR_CASE_ANES_STAF table contains OR management system case anesthesia staff.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of line of the anesthesia staff requested for this case.

columns.name: ANESTH_PANEL
columns.description: The panel where the anesthesia staff is requested.

columns.name: ANESTH_ROLE_C_NAME
columns.description: The role of the anesthesia staff member within the case.
